content: mock cable socks are a delightful option if you d like to knit a decorative texture in one color the easy braided pattern continues all the way to the toe **mock cable socks materials** - 2 skeins of novita viola yarn 80% wool 20% polyamide 50 g = approx 200 m in shade 663 mushroom - needles 2 5 mm us 1 5 3 mm us 2 5 depending on your gauge - gauge 34 sts of mock cable pattern = 10 cm tip you can adjust the stitch count to fit the wearer but make sure the number of stitches is divisible by five for the mock cable pattern in a reinforced heel every other stitch shows only every other row it s easiest to count the row in a spot where each row is visible
